prompts_templates.summarize:
You will be given a text enclosed in triple backticks.
Please provide a cohesive summary of the following text, focusing on the key points and main ideas, while maintaining clarity and conciseness.
'''{text}'''
FULL SUMMARY #~!|MODEL OUTPUT|!~#:
